title: E240 A Haunted Hotline and a Vegan Doc Marten Sized Baby
description: Welcome to episode 240! We've got the conclusions to both of our two-parters this week. First Em closes out the history of Ed and Lorraine Warren and their paranormal fame, as well as their potentially problematic side. Then Christine brings us the conclusion to the infuriating Amanda Knox saga, a story that affects Em unlike any other. And has Christine acquired her own personal dumpster? ...and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Christine Schiefer, Em Schulz)
